slide.title: All burnt trucker Jamaatul at Rajshahi Medical College Hospital after alleged Jamaat-Shibir men hurled a petrol bomb at his truck in Kansat of Chapainawabganj early yesterday. Photo: Star
Goods imported through Sonamasjid Landport lay in ruins after another truck, was torched in Kansat. Photo: Star
Injured bus driver Babul at the burn unit of DMCH after his vehicle was torched at Paribagh in the capital yesterday morning. Photo: Star
